title: Introducing: NÄM
body:
Huge potential showcased on this debut EP from Austin duo **NÄM**.

Merging elements of the silky pop-electronica that’s dominated blogs over the past couple of years (we’re talking Chet Faker, Flume, Odesza etc.) with the vulnerable yet compelling vocals of Nora Lueders, it’s an immensely exciting first few steps for them. Check out a couple of tracks below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
